paragraph.text: DISCLAIMER
by wxRaven
INTRODUCTION / WALLET PROTECTION
"wxRaven is a software that "
requires by nature
direct connexion to ravencore wallet
" for most of the features. For this reason, user "
must configure and verify all the settings
" before trying to perform any transaction or wallet actions."
"For a regular usage of wxRaven, we strongly recomend to use/create a dedicated ravencore wallet, this one should "
"protected by a passphrase and encypted "
as well.
"This software being opensource and available from internet, please "
verify the provenance of the package you downloaded
" and are about to use. the actual current and "
unique official repository is on Github
" : https://github.com/sLiinuX/wxRaven/releases"
EXTERNAL LINKS/PLUGINS DISCLAIMER
"The software may contain (or you may be sent through the software) "
links to other websites or content
" belonging to or originating from third parties or links to websites and features in banners or other advertising. "
Such external links are not investigated, monitored, or checked
" for accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability or completeness by us."
We
" do not warrant, endorse, guarantee, or assume responsibility "

for the accuracy or reliability of any information offered by third-party websites linked through the application or any website or feature linked in any banner or other advertising. We will not be a party to or in any way be responsible for monitoring any transaction between you and third-party providers of products or services.
